page.title: 04 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the work in the area is farming.About 90% of the population are involved in agriculture,-be it a farm owner,servant,specalized self- employed workman(fencing,hedging, building sheds etc.),or transporting animals to markets and hay and straw to customers.The only other jobs in the village are the local school where three teachers,two cooks and a caretaker are employed and the local post office and shop combined in to one.Also the gamekeeper for Cors Caron covers part of our block.The other people mostly have to travel to Aberystwyth,a distance of 16 miles away.A local lady now keeps a private home for the elderly in Swyddffynnon.
